data.title: The Vacation Nobody Wanted w/ Drew Sidora - Two Ts In A Pod with Teddi Mellencamp and Tamra Judge
meta_keywords: The Vacation Nobody Wanted w/ Drew Sidora
Two Ts In A Pod with Teddi Mellencamp and Tamra Judge
data.meta_description:
Reunited and it feels so (not) good. It’s the Dubai reunion and it is dicey!  

The ladies are bringing the heat so we brought back Drew Sidora to break it all down!

Speaking of break downs… OOOF!! The BH trip to Aspen is already off to a rocky start. 

Can they recover?? We’re not sure…

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
data.text:
Reunited and it feels so (not) good. It’s the Dubai reunion and it is dicey!

The ladies are bringing the heat so we brought back Drew Sidora to break it all down!

Speaking of break downs… OOOF!! The BH trip to Aspen is already off to a rocky start.

Can they recover?? We’re not sure…
